ALSO there is a problem a HUGE problem where for some reason the controls stop working, seriously YOU CAN'T use the 98% of the bottoms from the steam deck, the only ones that works are steam bottom and the touch screen (I'm not counting the power bottom and the volume bottoms)

Ah, Overwatch 2, where Blizzard's once shimmering beacon of innovation has now dimmed to a mere flicker. Remember the days when Blizzard stood for gamers? Now it feels like they've turned their back, chasing after the next shiny penny. The heroes? More like recycled ideas from a bygone era. Maps? I've seen better in indie games. And don't get me started on the microtransactions. It's like they took a page out of 'How to Disappoint Your Loyal Fanbase 101'. 10/10 for the audacity, Blizzard. You've truly outdone yourself this time.

He jugado mas de 500 horas a este juego y puedo decir que es muy muy bueno y equilibrado en partida. Blizzard (Ahora Microsoft) debería de cuidarlo mucho mas porque aun siendo bueno tiene mucho potencial por crear todavía. Darle una oportunidad que es gratis y si no te convence se desinstala y aquí no ha pasado nada.

Actual dumpster fire of a game, it used to be good, even to the point in which I purchased OW1 twice, once on the Xbox One and now on PC when it still existed. Now with so many horrible changes and a bunch of overpriced items, a boring battle pass system which literally makes me wish that loot boxes still existed and you gained one every level as an incentive to simply play the game, it was satisfying and I enjoyed it despite all of the issues and bad changes over the years and over all of the seasons. Now with 5v5 and so many issues, the ones that really get me are the changes to competitive and the ranking system being extremely awful right now, such as winning 5 matches and your rank doesn't even change, there's just no point anymore. And the cherry on top folks, I tried overwatch 2, I've done my placements in comp twice just to see on how it would feel, and the 2nd time was just an instance of the benefit of the doubt for the game. But overall I just don't enjoy it anymore, and it's sad cause this game was truly once a shining gem in a pool of team shooters.
Yes i like it now.

Wait, overwatch is also a video game?


https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/

So I do like Overwatch, never played enough Overwatch 1, so I was excited to play the game with friends again when Overwatch 2 came out. Also I love that they added this to steam, with no battle.net launcher, you still need the account but I don't care for that, as long as there is no unnecessary launcher, I'm happy.

Sadly the promises of PVE where totally wrong, they got changed into these weekly PVE mission things, that seem to be more of the events that we had in Overwatch 1. The Skill tree got completely removed. Old Overwatch 1 skins that were free now are in the store to be bought with real money. Also Overwatch 2 came out so much later with so little changes to Overwatch 1 that you wonder what the leadership at Blizzard was/is doing.

When Overwatch 2 launched, do to bugs and glitches, you essentially had less then when Overwatch 1 was out. They have fixed most things to my knowledge.

There is more to type out here, but I feel like that is enough. I have had lots of fun with Overwatch 2 but the damages that are always being done by Blizzard are just to much for me to still enjoy the game, or to even recommend it.
Free game and quite fun with friends!

Littéralement Overwatch 1 avec moins de contenu et plus de micro-transactions, en bref, un jeu toujours aussi inintéressant, ennuyeux, qui plaira qu'au gens sans goût et qui reflète au final bien l'industrie cancérigène du jeu vidéo, autant jouer à TF2.

I used to play first Overwatch for YEARS since the release to 2019. I stopped playing at December 2019. The reason? Lack of new stuff, even if Sigma appeared. And here we are, it's 2023 and actual new stuff make the game WORSE.
I have no idea how Blizzard could mess up the game which wall all over the internet, everyone talked about it and played it.

So what I used to like in first OW... Lootboxes. For real, and now I seriously miss them. During events I knew what I can get and with some luck I could get those stuff without spending money. If event was near the end and I still didn't have the legendary skin, I was buying some boxes time to time. Of course I didn't have to tho, that was my decision.
Here, in Overwatch 2, battle pass tells you "Spend your money on those goodies, or grind like crazy to get those skins OR EVEN UNLOCK THE CHARACTER"... Rly? I've never felt like I have to spend real cash to unlock character earlier and if I will decided to grind and miss it then blizzard showes me middle finger. I hate grind, I have my own life, responsibilities, and I don't have enough time to avoid Blizzard's greed other way than spending money.

In OW 1 I didn't feel like I literally have to work for those stuff. And the game could survive at its previous form only if Blizzard would decide to change neccesary things and stop changing things which no one needed. And SUPPORT THE GAME. Isn't it funny how Ubisoft still holds Siege in form which it used to be with improvements since 2015, but Blizzard failed? Check out old Battlefield titles, which won't even change now but people keep playing and love those games. Don't change what works! That's simple.

I truly miss first Overwatch, and wish I could play it, feel the excitement seeing gold effect jumping out of the box and hoping it's the skin I wish for. Back then I wouldn't think I will be missing lootboxes so much.

你说的对 但是《守望先锋 归来》是由动视暴雪自主研发的一款全新第一人称射击游戏。我现在每玩一周守望先锋都能赚60金币，每个月差不多240金币的收入，也就是现实生活中每个月7.2元的收入水平，换算过来31周，也就是7个月，我就可以买一个守望先锋的普通金皮，虽然守望先锋1只要1000金币升级还给箱子可以有几率开出，但是已经超越了中国绝大多数人(包括你)的水平，这便是守望先锋给我的骄傲的资本。ow没有义务给你你想得到的东西，他只是一款游戏,给你带来快乐，还要依着你的小脾气?他就算不让你玩，他也没有不对的地方，记住ow没欠你,也许我们大家还欠暴雪一句谢谢，暴雪花费大量精力和金钱制作的ow，最后免费开放给玩家，你们居然还不知足，记住是我们选择的ow,不是ow选择的我们，觉得不好可以退游，暴雪、ow不欠我们,但是我们欠暴雪、ow一句谢谢，以及制作组两年多幸苦制作，而不是在这口诛笔伐问官方要补偿，如果你觉得我说的不对，一定是不懂2016夏天的含金量。


你的素养很好，我每天玩守望先锋不仅一分钱都拿不到反而花出去几百块钱，而且游戏还即将关服，换成中国说法就是妥妥的大冤种，这远低于国内平均(包括你)的水平，这就是守望先锋给我自卑的资本
给游戏5分，扣100分给暴毙烤迪克这个司马孤儿崽种
